posting_body: We are currently offering virtual tours.
Please use the link in this ad to visit our website and set up a tour today or give us a call!
Welcome to 345 HARRISON
This is a 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1472 Sq.
Ft.
345 Harrison Apartments feature quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and wood plank flooring.
Select apartments feature magnificent Downtown and Back Bay views.
Residents are invited to enjoy the convenient on-site amenities including a resort-style pool, two-story fitness center complete with a yoga room, and a Sky Deck with breathtaking views.
Living in the South End provides convenient access to the best of Boston.
Come see these South End apartments for yourself by scheduling an appointment.
Features:

Downtown views*, Bay windows*, Walk-in closets, Penthouse living*, Floor-to-ceiling windows, Balcony, Stainless steel appliances, South Boston views*, Italian cabinetry, Keyless entry, Dual vanity bathroom sinks*, Washer and dryer, Kitchen island*, USB outlets, Quartz countertops, California Closets, Premium bathroom fixtures, Tile backsplash, Den*, Wood plank flooring, Large closet(s)*, Back Bay views*, Granite countertops*, Blue Hill views
*Apartment amenities not available in every home.
Community amenities may require an additional fee.
